name: Fox & Dog
description:
A game that I made for the Weekly Hour Game Jam W2 with Lua and Love2D.
Theme : The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.

I took it literally.

You are playing the fox. Jump with the space bar to avoid the dog otherwise you get hit ;-)

Credits :
background picture : bevouliin.com
background music : Botanic
fox sprites: Karasuba
fox jump sound : myself
dog sprites: Reemax
hit sound : myself
